item.description: They have a great buffet and are looking forward to our visit.  Come join us after work for a great time and mingle with old and new friends!  It’s a nice way to end the work week.  There is no charge.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 120 College Street:  I‑91 to left Exit 22S (Rt. 9S), continue 5.5 miles, turn right onto Washington Street (Rt. 66), at light on Main Street turn left, turn right at second light, facility on left.  You can park just past facility in public parking area.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
